title: Dems Flip on the Riots | Guests: Ken Cuccinelli & Michael Anton | 9/1/20
description:
Joe Biden and the Democrats are finally condemning the violent riots, but only to blame Trump. Meanwhile, Kamala Harris advocated for bailing out arrested protesters, some of whom were very violent. Former Trump national security official Michael Anton discusses his new book, “The Stakes: America at the Point of No Return,” and what may come next if the country goes under. Acting DHS Deputy Secretary Ken Cuccinelli gives the latest on the Portland and Kenosha riot shootings and the Democrats’ narrative that the Right is inflaming violence. Joe Biden is no moderate, and leftists admit he would be a very progressive president. As Trump heads to Kenosha, Glenn reviews which party has actually been stirring up violence.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
